title: 5 Quick Steps to How to Draw a Perfect Circle on Microsoft Paint

steps.title: Open Microsoft Paint.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Paint . You can find it by searching your app list or typing "Paint" into the Start menu.

steps.title: Select the "Shapes" drop-down menu.
steps.content: Select the "Shapes" drop-down menu. This is between Brushes and Size . [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Select the circle shape.
steps.content: Select the circle shape. You can find this in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Hold ⇧ Shift while you click and drag.
steps.content: Hold ⇧ Shift while you click and drag. This will draw the circle. The more you drag, the bigger the circle will be.

steps.title: Release the mouse button first, and then release Shift.
steps.content: Release the mouse button first, and then release Shift. If you release Shift first, the circle may revert back to an oval. The circle will be created. If desired, you can color it by shading it or blending it .
